data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value:
SELECT TrnPayroll.PeriodId, MstCompany.Company, CASE TrnPayroll.PeriodId WHEN 7 THEN '2024' WHEN 8 THEN '2025' END AS Year,
TrnPayrollLine.EmployeeId, MstEmployee.FullName, TrnPayroll.MonthId, CASE TrnPayroll.MonthId WHEN 1 THEN 'January' WHEN 2 THEN 'February' WHEN 3 THEN 'March' WHEN 4 THEN 'April' WHEN 5 THEN 'May' WHEN 6 THEN 'June' WHEN 7 THEN 'July' WHEN 8 THEN 'August' WHEN 9 THEN 'September' WHEN 10 THEN 'October' WHEN 11 THEN 'November' WHEN 12 THEN 'December' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS MonthName,
SUM(CASE WHEN MstEmployee.PayrollTypeId = 3 THEN MstEmployee.PayrollRate ELSE 0 END) AS FixBasicSalary,
SUM( CASE WHEN MstEmployee.PayrollTypeId = 1 THEN TrnPayrollLine.TotalSalaryAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalLegalHolidayWorkingAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalSpecialHolidayWorkingAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalRegularRestdayAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalLegalHolidayRestdayAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalSpecialHolidayRestdayAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalRegularOvertimeAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalLegalHolidayOvertimeAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalSpecialHolidayOvertimeAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalRegularNightAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalLegalHolidayNightAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalSpecialHolidayNightAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalRegularNightOvertimeAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalLegalHolidayNightOvertimeAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalSpecialHolidayNightOvertimeAmount ELSE 0 END ) AS VariableBasicSalary,
SUM( CASE WHEN MstEmployee.PayrollTypeId = 3 THEN MstEmployee.PayrollRate ELSE 0 END ) + SUM( CASE WHEN MstEmployee.PayrollTypeId = 1 THEN TrnPayrollLine.TotalSalaryAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalLegalHolidayWorkingAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalSpecialHolidayWorkingAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalRegularRestdayAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalLegalHolidayRestdayAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalSpecialHolidayRestdayAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalRegularOvertimeAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalLegalHolidayOvertimeAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalSpecialHolidayOvertimeAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalRegularNightAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalLegalHolidayNightAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalSpecialHolidayNightAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalRegularNightOvertimeAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalLegalHolidayNightOvertimeAmount - TrnPayrollLine.TotalSpecialHolidayNightOvertimeAmount ELSE 0 END ) AS Salary,
SUM(TrnPayrollLine.TotalSalaryAmount) AS TotalSalaryAmount ,
SUM( [TotalRegularOvertimeAmount] + [TotalLegalHolidayOvertimeAmount] + [TotalSpecialHolidayOvertimeAmount] + [TotalRegularNightOvertimeAmount] + [TotalLegalHolidayNightOvertimeAmount] + [TotalSpecialHolidayNightOvertimeAmount] ) AS TotalOvertimeAmount,
SUM( [TotalLegalHolidayWorkingAmount] + [TotalSpecialHolidayWorkingAmount] + [TotalRegularRestdayAmount] + [TotalLegalHolidayRestdayAmount] + [TotalSpecialHolidayRestdayAmount] + [TotalRegularOvertimeAmount] + [TotalLegalHolidayOvertimeAmount] + [TotalSpecialHolidayOvertimeAmount] + [TotalRegularNightAmount] + [TotalLegalHolidayNightAmount] + [TotalSpecialHolidayNightAmount] + [TotalRegularNightOvertimeAmount] + [TotalLegalHolidayNightOvertimeAmount] + [TotalSpecialHolidayNightOvertimeAmount] ) AS OtherSalary,
SUM(TrnPayrollLine.TotalTardyAmount) AS TotalTardyAmount, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.TotalAbsentAmount) AS TotalAbsentAmount, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.TotalNetSalaryAmount) AS TotalNetSalaryAmount, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.TotalOtherIncomeTaxable) AS TotalOtherIncomeTaxable, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.TotalOtherIncomeNonTaxable) AS TotalOtherIncomeNonTaxable, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.GrossIncome) AS GrossIncome, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.GrossIncomeWithNonTaxable) AS GrossIncomeWithNonTaxable, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.SSSContribution) AS SSSContribution, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.PHICContribution) AS PHICContribution, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.HDMFContribution) AS HDMFContribution, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.Tax) AS Tax, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.TotalOtherDeduction) AS TotalOtherDeduction, SUM(TrnPayrollLine.NetIncome) AS NetIncome
FROM TrnPayrollLine INNER JOIN TrnPayroll ON TrnPayrollLine.PayrollId = TrnPayroll.Id INNER JOIN MstEmployee ON TrnPayrollLine.EmployeeId = MstEmployee.Id INNER JOIN MstPeriod ON TrnPayroll.PeriodId = MstPeriod.Id INNER JOIN MstPayrollGroup ON TrnPayroll.PayrollGroupId = MstPayrollGroup.Id INNER JOIN MstCompany ON MstEmployee.CompanyId = MstCompany.Id
WHERE TrnPayroll.IsLocked = 1 AND (@ParamMonthId = 0 OR TrnPayroll.MonthId = @ParamMonthId) AND (@ParamPeriod = 0 OR TrnPayroll.PeriodId = @ParamPeriod) AND (@ParamPayrollGroupId = 0 OR TrnPayroll.PayrollGroupId = @ParamPayrollGroupId) AND (@ParamCompanyId = 0 OR MstEmployee.CompanyId = @ParamCompanyId)
GROUP BY TrnPayroll.PeriodId, TrnPayroll.MonthId, TrnPayrollLine.EmployeeId, MstEmployee.FullName, MstEmployee.CompanyId, MstCompany.Company
ORDER BY MstEmployee.FullName ASC;
